Protocols/CariocaMenuDataSource.html#/c:.name: menuView
Protocols/CariocaMenuDataSource.html#/c:.abstract: The view of the menu that will be displayed

Protocols/CariocaMenuDataSource.html#/c:.name: preselectRowAtIndexPath(_:)
Protocols/CariocaMenuDataSource.html#/c:.abstract: Optional Will be called when the indicator hovers a menu item.

Protocols/CariocaMenuDataSource.html#/c:.name: selectRowAtIndexPath(_:)
Protocols/CariocaMenuDataSource.html#/c:.abstract: Required Will be called when the user selects a menu item (by tapping or just releasing the indicator)

Protocols/CariocaMenuDataSource.html#/c:.name: heightByMenuItem()
Protocols/CariocaMenuDataSource.html#/c:.abstract: Required Gets the height by each row of the menu. Used for internal calculations

Protocols/CariocaMenuDataSource.html#/c:.name: numberOfMenuItems()
Protocols/CariocaMenuDataSource.html#/c:.abstract: Required Gets the number of menu items

Protocols/CariocaMenuDataSource.html#/c:.name: iconForRowAtIndexPath(_:)
Protocols/CariocaMenuDataSource.html#/c:.abstract: Required Gets the icon for a specific menu item

Protocols/CariocaMenuDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: cariocaMenuWillOpen(_:)
Protocols/CariocaMenuDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Optional Called when the menu is about to open

Protocols/CariocaMenuDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: cariocaMenuDidOpen(_:)
Protocols/CariocaMenuDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Optional Called when the menu just opened

Protocols/CariocaMenuDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: cariocaMenuWillClose(_:)
Protocols/CariocaMenuDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Optional Called when the menu is about to be dismissed

Protocols/CariocaMenuDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: cariocaMenuDidClose(_:)
Protocols/CariocaMenuDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Optional Called when the menu is dismissed

Protocols/CariocaMenuDelegate.html#/c:@M.name: cariocaMenuDidSelect(_:indexPath:)
Protocols/CariocaMenuDelegate.html#/c:@M.abstract: Optional Called when a menu item was selected

Protocols/CariocaMenuDelegate.html.name: CariocaMenuDelegate
Protocols/CariocaMenuDelegate.html.abstract: Delegate Protocol for events on menu opening/closing

Protocols/CariocaMenuDataSource.html.name: CariocaMenuDataSource
Protocols/CariocaMenuDataSource.html.abstract: DataSource protocol for filling up the menu

Enums/CariocaMenuBoomerangType.html#/c:@.name: none
Enums/CariocaMenuBoomerangType.html#/c:@.abstract: Default value. The indicators will always return where they were let.

Enums/CariocaMenuBoomerangType.html#/c:@.name: vertical
Enums/CariocaMenuBoomerangType.html#/c:@.abstract: The indicators will always come back at the same Y value. They may switch from Edge if the user wants.

Enums/CariocaMenuBoomerangType.html#/c:@.name: verticalAndHorizontal
Enums/CariocaMenuBoomerangType.html#/c:@.abstract: The indicators will always come back at the exact same place

Enums/CariocaMenuIndicatorViewPosition.h.name: CariocaMenuIndicatorViewPosition
Enums/CariocaMenuIndicatorViewPosition.h.abstract: The initial vertical position of the menu

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.name: hostView
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.abstract: The view in which containerView will be added as a subview.

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.name: boomerang
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.abstract: The type of boomerang for the menu. Default : None

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.name: openingEdge
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.abstract: The edge on which the menu will open

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.name: isDraggableVertically
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.abstract: Allows the user to reposition the menu vertically. Should be called AFTER addIn View()

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.name: isAlwaysOnScreen
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.abstract: If true, the menu will always stay on screen. If false, it will depend on the user’s gestures.

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:7carioca11Ca.name: addInView()
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:7carioca11Ca.abstract: Adds the menu in the container view

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.name: gestureTouched(_:)
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.abstract: Manages the menu position depending on the gesture (UIScreenEdgePanGestureRecognizer and UIPanGestureRecognizer)

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.name: didSelectRowAtIndexPath(_:fromContentController:)
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.abstract: Calls the delegate actions for row selection

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.name: moveToTop()
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.abstract: Makes sure the containerView is on top of the hostView

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:7carioca11Ca.name: addBlur()
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:7carioca11Ca.abstract: Adds blur to the container view (real blur for iOS > 7)

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.name: tappedOnIndicatorView(_:)
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.abstract: Manages the tap on an indicator view

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:7carioca11Ca.name: adaptMenuYForIndicatorY(_:afterDragging:)
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:7carioca11Ca.abstract: Adapts the menu Y position depending on the position of the indicator

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.name: showIndicator(_:position:offset:)
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.abstract: Shows the indicator on a precise position

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:7carioca11Ca.name: showIndicatorOnTopOfMenu(_:)
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:7carioca11Ca.abstract: Shows the indicator on top of the selected menu indexPath

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:7carioca11Ca.name: indicator(for:)
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:7carioca11Ca.abstract: Returns the right indicator for the asked edge

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.name: updateIndicatorsImage(_:)
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.abstract: Updates the image inside the indicator, to match the menu item

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:7carioca11Ca.name: updateIndicatorsForIndexPath(_:)
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:7carioca11Ca.abstract: Updates the indicator position to match the position of a specific indexPath in the menu

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.name: disableEdge(_:)
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@M@carioca@o.abstract: Disables a specific edge for the menu (Both edges are active by default)

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@CM@carioca@.name: getBoomerangVerticalValue()
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@CM@carioca@.abstract: Gets the saved value for the vertical boomerang

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@CM@carioca@.name: getBoomerangHorizontalValue()
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/c:@CM@carioca@.abstract: Gets the saved value for the horizontal boomerang

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:7carioca11Ca.name: addGestureHelperViews(_:width:)
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:7carioca11Ca.abstract: Adds Gesture helper views in the container view.

Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:7carioca11Ca.name: prepareGestureHelperView(_:width:)
Classes/CariocaMenu.html#/s:7carioca11Ca.abstract: Generates a gesture helper view with autolayout constraints

Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/c.name: edge
Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/c.abstract: The edge of the indicator. One indicator by edge maximum

Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/c.name: size
Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/c.abstract: The size of the indicator. Will be used for calculations, needs to be public

Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/s.name: edgeConstraint
Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/s.abstract: The edge constraint, will depend on the edge. (Trailing or Leading)

Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/c.name: topConstraint
Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/c.abstract: The top constraint to adjust the vertical position

Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/s.name: imageView
Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/s.abstract: The imageView to display your nicest icons.

Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/c.name: draw(_:)
Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/c.abstract: Drawing of the indicator. The shape was drawed using PaintCode

Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/c.name: showAt(_:offset:)
Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/c.abstract: Shows the indicator at the demanded position

Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/c.name: updateY(_:)
Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/c.abstract: Updates the Y position of the indicator

Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/c.name: restoreOnOriginalEdge(_:completion:)
Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/c.abstract: Restores the indicator on its initial position, depending on the boomerang type of the menu

Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/c.name: moveYOverMenu(_:containerWidth:)
Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/c.abstract: Adapts the Y position of the indicator, while being on top of the menu

Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/c.name: moveInScreenForDragging()
Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/c.abstract: Moves the indicator on the edge of the screen, when the user longPressed on it.

Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/s.name: animateX(_:speed1:position2:speed2:completion:)
Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/s.abstract: Animates the X position of the indicator, in two separate animations

Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/s.name: getEdgeConstantValue(_:)
Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html#/s.abstract: Calculates the value to set to the edgeConstraint. (Negative or positive, depending on the edge)

Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html.name: CariocaMenuIndicatorView
Classes/CariocaMenuIndicatorView.html.abstract: The indicators contained into the menu (one on the left, one on the right)

Global Variables.html.name: Global Variables
Global Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
